scripts.predev: mkdir -p public/Assets/Platform && cp -r Assets/Platform/*.otf public/Assets/Platform/ 2>/dev/null || true; cp Assets/*.svg public/Assets/ 2>/dev/null || true; node scripts/generate-images-manifest.cjs
